author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Fourteen! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

Today we're checking out a WILD concept for an Indie Game. Assemble a team of loveable morons and embark on vital (or maybe not?) missions for the State. Or maybe a sentient AI? Aliens? The Bureau? Not sure? Let's find out. 

Check out FRIK HERE: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/497130?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 014 (LIVE!) - FRIK: A Failpunk Skirmish Game
